snippet: A swollen hip at the 2012 Adidas Grand Prix caused Oscar Pistorius, a double amputee, to miss by under a second qualifying for the 2012 London Olympics in the 400 meters.
abstract: Swollen hip at the 2012 Adidas Grand Prix causes Oscar Pistorius, a double amputee sprinter, to miss by under a second qualifying for the 2012 London Olympics in the 400 meters; Pistorius will have at least two more chances.
lead_paragraph: A swollen hip at the 2012 Adidas Grand Prix caused Oscar Pistorius, a double amputee, to miss by under a second qualifying for the 2012 London Olympics in the 400 meters.

headline.seo: Injuries Hinder and Heal at Men’s Olympic Qualifying Track Meet
headline.main: Injuries Hinder and Heal at Men’s Olympic Qualifying Track Meet
